putting sound waves to your vision



Hi. Nice to meet you!

I'm Manny Marx and I like meat stuff. For example this website and even the desk I'm sitting at making this website. However what I really like to do is make music, especially making music with people. Whether it be collaborating musically or creating sounds and music for persons vision, I love it. In fact, I'd say I'm pretty good at it, too. But hey, don't take my word for it, check out what people who have worked with me have to say about it.

Check it out

What I make sounds for

*but not limited to

Music Production

a soft lullaby, an action-packed chase scene, or a dark forest shrouded with an ominous presence.

I'll write it.

Sound Design

clicks, presses call swipes, footsteps, busy streets, or an intergalactic being from the depths of the crab nebula.

I'll make it.

Collaboration

songwriting, remixing, and sampling. As well as voice acting or as session musician.

I got you.

Entertainment Media

with copious amounts of time participating in all forms of media from social networking services to video games.

If there is a sound to be made for them,

I can craft it

How the process all goes down

Well first contact me at the bottom of the page and I'll get back to you as soon as I possibly can. From there we can set up our first meeting via Skype, G-chat, phone, face-to-face, or just stick to email, whichever you'd perfer. If possible, please provide a few reference materials (audio, visual, or both) I can use help with my research and creation process. Soon after I'll provide you with a demo and we can take it from there. I don't charge for any of this so no worries.

To read more about the creation process click the button below.
